scripts.quality:frontend: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.quality:python: cd services/ai && python -m black --check . && python -m isort --check-only . && python -m flake8 . && cd ../api && python -m black --check . && python -m isort --check-only . && python -m flake8 .
scripts.quality:python:fix: cd services/ai && python -m black . && python -m isort . && cd ../api && python -m black . && python -m isort .
scripts.quality:db: npx prisma validate && npx prisma format --check
scripts.quality:all: npm run quality:frontend && npm run quality:python && npm run quality:db
scripts.db:reset: prisma db push --force-reset && npm run db:seed
